title: Inspection

body.body: Check the radiator for stone damage.
Check the radiator core for damage to the fins or obstructions to air flow.
Repair any damage and clear all obstructions.
To avoid overheating and consequent engine damage, replace the radiator if the cores are blocked or if the fins are badly deformed or broken.
Check that the fan spins freely and without tight spots.
Check the fan blades for signs of heat distortion.
